query.value: SELECT N_IDX, V_DESC, V_START_DATETIME, V_END_DATETIME , ceil(to_date(SUBSTR(v_start_datetime,0,8),'yyyymmdd') - to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyymmdd')) as n_start_gap , ceil(to_date(SUBSTR(v_end_datetime,0,8),'yyyymmdd') - to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyymmdd') ) as n_end_gap FROM TIMECLOUD_ACTIVITY WHERE (N_TASK_IDX = ? AND N_OWNER_IDX = ?) AND C_DEL_YN = 'N' -- AND ( V_START_DATETIME LIKE ('201212%') OR V_END_DATETIME LIKE ('201212%') ) ORDER BY N_IDX DESC

SELECT N_IDX, V_DESC, V_START_DATETIME, V_END_DATETIME , ceil(to_date(SUBSTR(v_start_datetime,0,8),'yyyymmdd') - to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyymmdd')) as n_start_gap , ceil(to_date(SUBSTR(v_end_datetime,0,8),'yyyymmdd') - to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyymmdd') ) as n_end_gap , N_TASK_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_ACTIVITY WHERE N_TASK_IDX IN (SELECT N_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_LIST = (SELECT N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_IDX = ?)) AND C_DEL_YN = 'N' -- AND ( V_START_DATETIME LIKE ('201212%') OR V_END_DATETIME LIKE ('201212%') ) ORDER BY N_IDX DESC

SELECT N_IDX, V_DESC, V_START_DATETIME, V_END_DATETIME , ceil(to_date(SUBSTR(v_start_datetime,0,8),'yyyymmdd') - to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyymmdd')) as n_start_gap , ceil(to_date(SUBSTR(v_end_datetime,0,8),'yyyymmdd') - to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyymmdd') ) as n_end_gap , N_TASK_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_ACTIVITY WHERE N_OWNER_IDX = ? SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX, X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER , (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_ACTIVITY_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_ACTIVITY X, ( SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A , ( SELECT N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_OWNER_IDX = ? GROUP BY N_LIST) B WHERE A.N_LIST = B.N_LIST UNION SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A , ( SELECT E.N_IDX AS N_TASK_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK E, ( SELECT D.N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_OBSERVER C, TIMECLOUD_TASK D WHERE (C.N_TASK_IDX=D.N_IDX) AND C.N_OWNER_IDX = ? GROUP BY D.N_LIST ) F WHERE E.N_LIST = F.N_LIST ) B WHERE A.N_IDX = B.N_TASK_IDX ) Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX=Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

query.value: SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX,X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_ACTIVITY_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_ACTIVITY X, TIMECLOUD_TASK Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND Y.N_OWNER_IDX=? ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX, X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_ACTIVITY_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_ACTIVITY X, ( SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, TIMECLOUD_TASK B WHERE (A.N_PARENT_IDX = B.N_IDX) AND A.N_LEVEL > 0 AND B.N_OWNER_IDX = ? ) Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX=Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX,X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_ACTIVITY_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_ACTIVITY X, TIMECLOUD_TASK Y, TIMECLOUD_OBSERVER Z WHERE (X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND Y.N_IDX = Z.N_TASK_IDX) AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND Z.N_OWNER_IDX=? ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC
UPDATE TIMECLOUD_ACTIVITY SET C_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE N_IDX = ?
